_header: Now every man in his beginning
_description: ‘The working of the phylozophers stone’ — 169 lines

BosHistSoc.First Lines:
Now euery man In hys begynnyngThynke hys god swete heven
                    kyngIf y wylt Rede here A noneThe workyng of þe phyloȝophers
                    stone…
BosHistSoc.Last Lines:
…Now I haue taught the how þu shalt dooThe blys of heven
                    god bryng us too
